Behaviour Interactive | Montreal, QC, CA | ONSITE

Devops

What we do : game development company (mobile/console/desktop).

We're looking for an addition to our small sysadmin/devops team, currently responsible for ~300 servers (mostly AWS, a few physical servers). Docker, Puppet, Ansible, Python, Bash, Jenkins, CloudFormation, and other bits as well. Main goal is modernization and supporting new games.

Offer with details : http://smrtr.io/IT5NRQ Interview process : phone screen -> onsite interview (1-1.5hr) -> offer.
